generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A paved area alongside the road, separated by a curb and lined with trees and parked cars, is visible on the right side.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and green hedges are present along the sidewalks and in front of buildings.
- sky: A gray, overcast sky is visible above the buildings and trees, indicating cloudy weather.
- car: Several cars are parked along both sides of the road, and at least one car is visible in motion on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing straight ahead is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting overhead wires and traffic signs.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road, near the parked cars.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
